Sentencas: This paper examines an integrated gasification and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system with a gas turbine and steam cycle that uses heat recovery of the gas turbine exhaust.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of an integrated SOFC and coal gasification system

Sentencas: Energy and exergy analyses are performed with two different types of coal.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of an integrated SOFC and coal gasification system

Sentencas: For the two different cases, the energy efficiency of the overall system is 38.1% and 36.7%, while the exergy efficiency is 27% and 23.2%, respectively.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of an integrated SOFC and coal gasification system

Sentencas: The effects of changing the reference temperature on the exergy destruction and exergy efficiency of different components are also reported.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of an integrated SOFC and coal gasification system

Sentencas: A parametric study on the effects of changing the pressure ratio on the component performance is presented.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of an integrated SOFC and coal gasification system
